Name: Barold
About the game: Barold is a 2D Platformer with Medieval and Fantasy storyline. In this game, you play as Barold, a knight that has to navigate through hard and tricky jumps, fight bosses and most of all, dodge projectiles. Visit your old pals and ask them for help in search of Gothmog, a demon you used to call your friend. ABOUT THE GAME: This is the second Steam game by DevonAnimation and first collab of TyberiusInSD and Devon. It includes translations for Spanish and Russian and has two difficulties. Normal mode is the default version for casual gamers and Hard mode includes more challenges, specifically made for 'God Gamers.' WHAT TO EXPECT IN THE GAME: Smooth movement Unique 1:1 format Catchy and original soundtrack Cartoony and unique graphics Different armors with different stats Interactive and fair boss fights Hidden passages Hidden Easter Eggs and rooms Weapons Double Jumping ...
